languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Бывших арбитров{/d} не бывает, верно?" {n}Соломон уважительно кивает.{/n} "Не в обиду вашим навыкам — предпочитаю перестраховаться на стадии подготовки".

"Indeed. One {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}never truly leaves the Arbites{/d}." {n}Solomorne gives you a deferential nod.{/n} "I meant no disrespect to your skills, but I prefer to err on the side of caution."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Бывших арбитров{/d} не бывает, верно?" {n}Соломон уважительно кивает.{/n} "Не в обиду вашим навыкам — предпочитаю перестраховаться на стадии подготовки".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. One never truly leaves the Arbites." {n}Solomorne gives you a deferential nod.{/n} "I meant no disrespect for your skills, but I prefer to err on the side of caution."

"Indeed. One {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}never truly leaves the Arbites{/d}." {n}Solomorne gives you a deferential nod.{/n} "I meant no disrespect to your skills, but I prefer to err on the side of caution."

"Indeed. One {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}never truly leaves the Arbites{/d}." {n}Solomorne gives you a deferential nod.{/n} "I meant no disrespect to your skills, but I prefer to err on the side of caution."

languages.text: «Por supuesto. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}No es posible abandonar el Arbites por completo{/d}». {n}Solomorne inclina la cabeza con respeto.{/n} «No pretendía poner en duda sus habilidades; tan solo quería asegurarme».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. One {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}never truly leaves the Arbites{/d}." {n}Solomorne gives you a deferential nod.{/n} "I meant no disrespect to your skills, but I prefer to err on the side of caution."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto. No es posible abandonar el Arbites por completo». {n}Solomorne inclina la cabeza con respeto.{/n} «No pretendía poner en duda sus habilidades; tan solo quería asegurarme».
«Por supuesto. No es posible abandonar el Arbites por completo». {n}Solomorne inclina la cabeza con respeto.{/n} «No pretendía poner en duda sus habilidades; tan solo quería asegurarme».

languages.text: “确实如此。一日{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}侍奉法务部，终生都是法务官{/d}。”{n}索罗蒙恭敬地点了点头。{/n}“我对你的能力没有任何不敬之意，只是我更愿意谨慎行事。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. One {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}never truly leaves the Arbites{/d}." {n}Solomorne gives you a deferential nod.{/n} "I meant no disrespect to your skills, but I prefer to err on the side of caution."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。一日侍奉法务部，终生都是法务官。”{n}索罗蒙恭敬地点了点头。{/n}“我对你的能力没有任何不敬之意，只是我更愿意谨慎行事。”
“确实如此。一日侍奉法务部，终生都是法务官。”{n}索罗蒙恭敬地点了点头。{/n}“我对你的能力没有任何不敬之意，只是我更愿意谨慎行事。”

languages.text: « En effet. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}On ne quitte jamais vraiment l'Arbites{/d}, {n}rétorque Solomorne en inclinant la tête avec déférence.{/n} Simple précaution de ma part, n'y voyez surtout pas une remise en doute de vos compétences. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. One {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}never truly leaves the Arbites{/d}." {n}Solomorne gives you a deferential nod.{/n} "I meant no disrespect to your skills, but I prefer to err on the side of caution."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. On ne quitte jamais vraiment l'Arbites, {n}rétorque Solomorne en inclinant la tête avec déférence.{/n} Simple précaution de ma part, n'y voyez surtout pas une remise en doute de vos compétences. »

« En effet. On ne quitte jamais vraiment l'Arbites, {n}rétorque Solomorne en inclinant la tête avec déférence.{/n} Simple précaution de ma part, n'y voyez surtout pas une remise en doute de vos compétences. »

languages.text: 「確かに。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}アルビテスを完全に離れることはありません{/d}」{n}ソロモーンはあなたに敬意を表すようにうなずく{/n}「私はあなたの腕前を侮るつもりはありませんが、慎重に進める方が好みです」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. One {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}never truly leaves the Arbites{/d}." {n}Solomorne gives you a deferential nod.{/n} "I meant no disrespect to your skills, but I prefer to err on the side of caution."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに。アルビテスを完全に離れることはありません」{n}ソロモーンはあなたに敬意を表すようにうなずく{/n}「私はあなたの腕前を侮るつもりはありませんが、慎重に進める方が好みです」
「確かに。アルビテスを完全に離れることはありません」{n}ソロモーンはあなたに敬意を表すようにうなずく{/n}「私はあなたの腕前を侮るつもりはありませんが、慎重に進める方が好みです」

languages.text: "Doğru ya. İnsan, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Arbites'ten tam anlamıyla ayrılamazmış{/d}." {n}Solomorne başıyla seni saygıyla selamlıyor.{/n} "Becerilerinize saygısızlık etmek istemedim. Tedbiri elden bırakmamayı tercih ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. One {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}never truly leaves the Arbites{/d}." {n}Solomorne gives you a deferential nod.{/n} "I meant no disrespect to your skills, but I prefer to err on the side of caution."

traits.locale_text: "Doğru ya. İnsan, Arbites'ten tam anlamıyla ayrılamazmış." {n}Solomorne başıyla seni saygıyla selamlıyor.{/n} "Becerilerinize saygısızlık etmek istemedim. Tedbiri elden bırakmamayı tercih ediyorum."
"Doğru ya. İnsan, Arbites'ten tam anlamıyla ayrılamazmış." {n}Solomorne başıyla seni saygıyla selamlıyor.{/n} "Becerilerinize saygısızlık etmek istemedim. Tedbiri elden bırakmamayı tercih ediyorum."

languages.text: "In der Tat. Man {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}verlässt die Arbitratoren nie wirklich{/d}." {n}Solomorne nickt dir respektvoll zu.{/n} "Ich will nicht respektlos erscheinen, aber ich gehe lieber auf Nummer sicher."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. One {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}never truly leaves the Arbites{/d}." {n}Solomorne gives you a deferential nod.{/n} "I meant no disrespect to your skills, but I prefer to err on the side of caution."
